author: Video Advice
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/advice or use code ADVICE at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!

Dr. Bernardo Kastrup worked at CERN. He spent years deep inside the world of high-level science and technology. But something didn’t add up. Today, he’s one of the few respected voices claiming that reality is not made of matter — it’s made of mind. According to him, everything we experience is a projection of consciousness, and the physical world is just a mental illusion. His ideas are shaking the foundations of science — and revealing truths many still refuse to accept.

Watch the full interview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FcaV3EEmR9k

0:00 – Everything you know about reality is a lie?
1:06 – Former CERN scientist reveals the truth they've been hiding
1:54 – Matter doesn’t exist — it’s just mind wearing a mask
3:08 – The physical world is only a mental projection
3:50 – Reality is just a dashboard — and you’re the pilot
5:42 – If no one’s watching, nothing is really
title: CERN Scientist Goes Viral After Exposing the Illusion We Live In
